column4: strange thing with usb drive: tried to copy files to two different usb drives - created folder is there on both but the files are missing. what could be went wrong?
strange thing with usb drive: tried to copy files to two different usb drives - created folder is there on both but the files are missing. what could be went wrong?
Have you tried doing "contr + h"? Maybe those files are hidden (surelly because they names start with a dot)
yes i tested - the files are not hidden as well
